name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live ＂STELLAR into the GALAXY＂ Supported By Bushiroad [LtqzI9y5yII]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Showcase of flower stands sent by fans to celebrate Hoshimachi Suisei's 1st Solo Live.
Promotional showcase featuring concert footage snippets, audience guidelines, and merchandise information, accompanied by a song medley.

subtitles.original:
Flower Stand
フラワースタンド紹介
subtitles.english:
Flower Stand
Flower Stand Introduction

subtitles.original: だって僕は星を歌う
subtitles.english: Because I sing to the stars

subtitles.original: 感情が歪んで破れてた
subtitles.english: My emotions were warped and torn

subtitles.original: 頑丈な太古の衝動が
subtitles.english: Robust ancient impulses

subtitles.original: 言わなきゃいけない言葉いっぱい
subtitles.english: So many words I have to say

subtitles.original: あなたの目に映る
subtitles.english: Reflected in your eyes

subtitles.original: 可愛い私
subtitles.english: The cute me

subtitles.original: この瞬間オンリー望んでた midnight
subtitles.english: I've only wanted this moment, midnight

subtitles.original: 追われるまで
subtitles.english: Until I'm chased away

subtitles.original: ロマンスは殺した
subtitles.english: Romance is dead

subtitles.original: 足りない 聞かせて今だけは
subtitles.english: It's not enough, let me hear it, just for now

subtitles.original: アモーレ カモネ 夜に甘えて
subtitles.english: Amore, maybe... indulged in the night

subtitles.original:
無理矢理口付けに意味なんてないの
抑えられない方程式
subtitles.english:
Forcing a kiss is meaningless,
an uncontrollable equation

subtitles.original:
Attention
ご来場の皆様へ
subtitles.english:
Attention
To all attendees

subtitles.original:
マスクの着用にご協力ください
撮影/録音/録画は禁止とさせていただきます
subtitles.english:
Please cooperate by wearing a mask.
Filming, audio recording, and video recording are prohibited.

subtitles.original: 真っ白な思い愛お情が
subtitles.english: Pure white thoughts and affection

subtitles.original: 滲んで汚れてた
subtitles.english: Were blurred and stained

subtitles.original: 不器用な太古の対話が
subtitles.english: Clumsy ancient dialogue

subtitles.original: 不条理な言葉いっぱい
subtitles.english: So many absurd words

subtitles.original: 大人になったって
subtitles.english: Even as an adult

subtitles.original: 愛なんて知らないわ
subtitles.english: I don't know what love is

subtitles.original: この瞬間オンリー誤魔化す midnight
subtitles.english: Faking only this moment, midnight

subtitles.original: 残されたのは
subtitles.english: All that's left is...

subtitles.original: ロマンスの果て
subtitles.english: The end of romance

subtitles.original: 受注販売グッズ 0
subtitles.english: Made-to-order Goods 0

subtitles.original: 窓無しの世界は
subtitles.english: The windowless world

subtitles.original: 妙に煌めいてて
subtitles.english: Is strangely sparkling

subtitles.original: どんな毒を飲ませたら
subtitles.english: What kind of poison should I give?

subtitles.original: ねえ このまま連れ出してくれぬ
subtitles.english: Hey, won't you take me away just like this?

subtitles.original: 嗤って見せて
subtitles.english: Show me a sneer

subtitles.original: この隙間 迷って 迷って 狂うのに怯えて
subtitles.english: In this gap, wandering, wandering, afraid of going mad

subtitles.original: だめ このままじゃ
subtitles.english: No, not like this

subtitles.original: 行かないで
subtitles.english: Don't go

subtitles.original: 足りない 聞かせて今だけは
subtitles.english: It's not enough, let me hear it, just for now

subtitles.original: 祝えカモネ 夜に溺れて
subtitles.english: Celebrate, maybe... drowning in the night

subtitles.original:
無理矢理繰り返す意味なんてないの
抑えられない方程式
subtitles.english:
Repeating it by force is meaningless,
an uncontrollable equation

subtitles.original: やんちゃな放鳥
subtitles.english: A mischievous release

subtitles.original: 先までのヒステリックな街が
subtitles.english: The hysteric town until now...

subtitles.original: 幻想を脱いで煌めき取り戻す
subtitles.english: Casts off the illusion and regains its sparkle

subtitles.original:
Join Us, Be a Starry Starry Jet!
夜空を駆けるストリーミング
subtitles.english:
Join Us, Be a Starry Starry Jet!
Streaming across the night sky

subtitles.original:
Join Us, Be a Starry Starry Jet!
乗り遅れないでね
subtitles.english:
Join Us, Be a Starry Starry Jet!
Don't miss the ride

subtitles.original: Midnight Midnight 心地ええりすぐりの音楽たちを
subtitles.english: Midnight Midnight, carefully selected pleasant music

subtitles.original: 散りばめ Cherry 輝きで満たすよ
subtitles.english: Sprinkle it like cherries, I'll fill it with brilliance

subtitles.original: 地平線 彗星になろうよ
subtitles.english: Let's become a comet on the horizon

subtitles.original: 走り続ける町で
subtitles.english: In the town that keeps running

subtitles.original: 君と彗星になるんだ 盛り上がるの
subtitles.english: I'll become a comet with you, let's get excited

subtitles.original: Take You Higher 音を通って
subtitles.english: Take You Higher, through the sound

subtitles.original: パーティーは始まったばかり
subtitles.english: The party has just begun

subtitles.original: Take You Higher 連れて行くよ
subtitles.english: Take You Higher, I'll take you there

subtitles.original: さあ一緒に Fly
subtitles.english: Now, let's fly together
